name: Radio Browser Extension
author: Rubatron
description: Browse and play internet radio stations from radio-browser.info
features: Filter by country, genre, and name
Add favorites to moOde Radio library

changelog.2.0.0: Rewritten template system, troubleshooting panel, API latency monitoring, memory leak fixes
changelog.1.2.0: Searchable dropdowns, improved settings UI, system info panel
changelog.1.1.0: Recently played sidebar, favorites sync, logo integration
changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with search and playback
